divs: Sighting DetailsWas heading home from Walmart off Tower and I70. I noticed and round abject next to the moon that appeared at first to be a star. What was odd was how bright it was and that the moon was full and did not outshine the object. I observed the object for about 15 minutes before I got home. I tried to take a picture but all you could see was the moon. The object appeared at the lower right side of the moon around 5 o'clock.
